name: Allwin E K
about: Allwin E K is an aspiring Computer Science student and beginner in MERN stack development, who identifies as passionate about coding and problem-solving, and currently pursuing Computer Science and Engineering at Ponjesly College of Engineering.
achievements: 1st Prize in Web Browser Design and Quiz at DMI College of Engineering, Aralvaimozhi
2nd Prize in Web Pixies at Amrita College of Engineering and Technology, Erachakulam
3rd Prize in Technical Quiz at Annai Vailankanni College Of Engineering, Azhagappapuram
1st Prize in Paper Presentation and 2nd Prize in Ad Mad (Non technical) at St. Xavier's Catholic College of Engineering, Chunkankadai
